column4: hi, when I'm trying to open php file from local apache it shows download dialog with PTHML file - what do I need to change in default ubuntu apache2 pkg config to make it work?
in your httpd.conf, search for an AddType line that includes .php and .phtml
You should have something like "AddType  application/x-httpd-php .php .phtml"
looking at mine, (/etc/apache/httpd.conf) it's commented out and only includes .php, not .phtml
